entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:17 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
